nodes.text: A powered spear was a melee weapon.

Around 21 BBY during the Clone Wars, a battle took place near the planet of Patitite Pattuna and ended up with the Protocol droid C-3PO and his Astromech droid accomplice R2-D2 crash landing on the surface. These spears were used by the Patitites to hold down the droids moments after landing.
Powered spears were around the same height as the Patitites and produced an electrical charge mainly to harm droids.
